page.title: NetPanzer - An Online Multiplayer Tactical Warfare Game

subsection.title: Linux and Source Code
subsection.p: For linux only source is provided for now, hopefully the distributions will generate packages optimized for them.

You only need this file to compile & play, the data files are included, in other releases it was split in 2 files (source and data). You will also need Jam, PhysicsFS, SDL and SDL_mixer to compile it.

subsection.title: Linux
subsection.p: Some linux distributions already come with NetPanzer packages by default. You might just be able to install NetPanzer with your distributions software setup tool. All other users should try the autopackage or building from source.

ul.li: x86 Linux Installer (made with autopackage): netpanzer-0.8.x86.package (11MB)

subsection.title: Music
subsection.p: Pronobozo remixed some of his songs for use within netpanzer. Download the zipfile and unzip it in your netpanzer directory or in $HOME/.netpanzer: netpanzer-music.zip (32MB)

subsection.title: Source Code
subsection.p: You need both the gamedata and the source if you want to compile yourself, in addition you need Jam, PhysicsFS, SDL, SDL_net, SDL_mixer, SDL_image and SDL_ttf, see the README for details.

subsubsection.title: Development Snapshot
subsubsection.p: Source Code is also available via SVN. Look at the netpanzer svn page for details.

subsection.title: Old Releases
subsection.p: Older releases and other files are available via the Berlios's Filelist.
